resources.string: 1. This character was the leader of a division of Overwatch known as Blackwatch. He was almost killed in a accident at Overwatch headquarters, and the efforts to save him turned him into a wraith-like figure. What is the name of this character?

2. This character is British in nationality. She was once a test pilot for an experimental time-traveling aircraft, but was lost in time due to the effects of the experiment going poorly. Who is this character?
3. Which of the following heroes are in the tank class? (2 correct answers)

4. This character is a giant German who wields a rocket-powered hammer and can project a giant shield. He was once a member of the German Crusaders during the Omnic Crisis. What is the name of this character?
5. This character was chosen to be a part of a super-solider making program. Afterwards, he became the leader of Overwatch, until an accident brought about his supposed death. Who is this character?
6. Which hero is the latest addition to Overwatch?
This female character is very involved in fighting for environmental preservation. She was cryogenically frozen at a climate station in Antarctica. What is the name of this character?
